thread.section_title: Clothes2order.com Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.clothes2order.com | 4 of 316
thread.title: Teresa

author: Teresa
title: Teresa
text:
We had some sizing issues with the T-shirts ordered for our Bistro staff. The Guildan shirts came up incredibly small; not true to the sizing chart given. However, the matter was dealt with very quickly and we were sent a few extra shirts in larger sizes free of charge.
The print and logos look great and the actual quality of the fabric is good.
I would recommend this company.
